# bds-menu-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                   | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size. Used to set the size of the divider.    | `string` | `null`  |
| `value`  | `value`   | Value. Used to insert a title to the divider. | `string` | `null`  |
